channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The ‘Stranger Things’ Finale Mind Flayer-Vecna Fight Is Being Misunderstood
item.description: The Stranger Things series finale featured a huge showdown between Vecna joining the Mind Flayer fighting the rest of the cast. But people aren't gett...

item.title: Miss ‘Stranger Things’ Already? LEGO’s Creel House Is Here To Help
item.description: The Creel House is, quite fittingly, a monster set, and was officially launched at the same time as the Stranger Things finale.

item.title: San Francisco Blackout Reveals AI’s Dependence On Power Infrastructure
item.description: Power outage San Francisco affected humans and AI systems alike. As Waymo had to navigate 7,000 dark traffic signals, it highlighted the AI's reliance...

item.title: Northern Lights Alert Friday: 20 States May See Aurora ‘Direct Hit’
item.description: A NOAA forecast suggest that Northern Lights may be visible in northern U.S. states this weekend during a G2 geomagnetic storm.

item.title: Feds are hunting teenage hacking groups like ‘Scattered Spider’ who have targeted $1 trillion worth of the Fortune 500 since 2022
item.description: Rogue teens have attacked some 120 companies—including Nike, Chick-fil-A, Instacart, and News Corporation—often posing as IT staff.

item.title: Negative prices for electricity are getting more common in Europe and consumer costs have dipped—while Americans face rising energy bills
item.description: By September, the number of hours in Spain with negative prices had already topped 500 for the year to date, more than double the full-year total for ...

item.title: Mark Cuban says he doesn’t do calls and prefers email because ‘if we do it by phone, I’m going to forget half the stuff that we talked about’
item.description: Meanwhile, Gen Zers prefer email or text because of their anxiety about talking on the phone.

item.title: Americans surge toward financial resolutions for 2026 amid household budget concerns
item.description: More Americans are planning financial resolutions for 2026, with 64% focusing on short-term savings goals amid inflation concerns, up from 56% last ye...

item.title: Oil and gas prices expected to stay significantly lower through 2026
item.description: Oil and gas prices are set to drop by 2026, with Brent crude falling to $55 per barrel and retail gas reaching $3 per gallon, according to new EIA pro...

item.title: As Insurers Drop Obesity Drug Coverage, Access Worsens For Those Most In Need

item.title: CEOs say they are unplugging from the top job by cancelling all meetings and playing with Legos over the holidays
item.description: The leaders behind tech companies and multimillion-dollar cookie empires weigh in on work-life balance during the holidays—from strict screen time lim...

item.title: IRS guidance for Trump's 'no tax on tips' and overtime deductions: What to know
item.description: The IRS released new guidance for no tax on tips and overtime deductions under the One Big Beautiful Bill Act. Eligible workers can claim up to $25,00...

item.title: It’s New Year’s Day 2026. What’s open and closed?
item.description: Most federal services are shuttered, but the retail landscape remains mixed.

item.title: China made the world’s biggest movie last year and didn’t need America’s help

Trump delays higher tariffs on kitchen cabinets and home furnishings
Mortgage rates hit 2025 low as homebuyers catch a break
item.description: Mortgage rates drop to their lowest point in 2025, offering potential relief for homebuyers in today's competitive housing market across the nation.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
